fields.name: AAX HD Incell iPhone 11 LCD Module Display and Touch Screen Digitizer Assembly

fields.description: Premium Soft OLED display assembly with integrated touch screen digitizer for iPhone 13 Pro Max. High-quality replacement featuring vibrant colors and responsive touch functionality.

fields.name: iWatch Series 5 Replacement LCD Screen 40MM – GPS LTE – A2156
fields.description: Genuine-compatible LCD replacement screen for Apple Watch Series 5 40mm (Model A2156) with GPS + LTE functionality. Includes full display assembly for precise touch response.

fields.description: Compatible LCD replacement screen for Apple Watch Series 1 38mm (Model A1802). Includes display assembly with responsive touch functionality for watch repairs.

fields.name: Replacement OLED LCD Screen For Samsung Galaxy S23 FE (S71IB) – With Frame
fields.description: Premium OLED display replacement for Samsung Galaxy S23 FE (Model S71IB), including pre-installed frame. Features vibrant colors and energy efficiency compared to traditional LCDs.

fields.name: Genuine LCD Screen for Samsung Galaxy A11 (A115) With Frame and Touchpad – Black (GH81-18760A)
fields.description: OEM-quality LCD replacement for Samsung Galaxy A11 (Model A115), including pre-assembled frame and touchpad. Black color variant with official part number GH81-18760A. Budget-friendly solution for A11 repairs.

fields.name: Replacement LCD Display Touch Screen For Motorola Moto E20 – XT2155 – No Frame
fields.description: Basic LCD touch screen replacement for Motorola Moto E20 (Model XT2155). Screen-only assembly (frame not included) for cost-effective repairs on budget devices.

fields.name: Replacement LCD Display Touch Screen For Motorola Moto G05 – No Frame – Black
fields.description: Cost-effective LCD touch screen replacement for Motorola Moto G05. Screen-only assembly (frame not included) with basic touch functionality. Ideal for budget-conscious repairs.
fields.install_notes: Requires frame transfer from original device

fields.name: OEM LCD Screen Display Touch and Digitizer Assembly For Google Pixel 3A (G020G) – No Frame
fields.description: Original-equivalent LCD display with integrated touch digitizer for Google Pixel 3A (Model G020G). Screen-only assembly (frame not included) designed for precise color accuracy and touch response.
fields.install_notes: Requires careful separation of original frame. Not recommended for first-time repairers.

fields.name: Replacement OLED LCD Screen Display Touch and Digitizer Assembly For Google Pixel 4A 4G – With Frame
fields.description: Premium OLED display assembly with pre-installed frame for Google Pixel 4A 4G. Features integrated touch digitizer, vibrant colors (100% DCI-P3), and factory-calibrated accuracy. Complete plug-and-play solution.

fields.name: Replacement LCD Display Touch Screen For One Plus 3T (A3003) – With Frame – White
fields.description: Complete LCD touch screen assembly with white frame for OnePlus 3T (Model A3003). Includes pre-installed frame and adhesive for simplified installation. Maintains original display clarity.

fields.name: Replacement LCD Screen Display Touch and Digitizer Assembly for Xiaomi Redmi 12C – No Frame
fields.description: Budget LCD display with integrated touch digitizer for Xiaomi Redmi 12C. Screen-only assembly requires frame transfer. Designed for cost-effective repairs on Xiaomi's entry-level devices.

fields.name: Replacement LCD Screen Display Touch and Digitizer Assembly for Xiaomi Mi Note 10 Black – No Frame
fields.description: High-quality LCD replacement for Xiaomi Mi Note 10 (2019 flagship). Features AMOLED-like color calibration and 1080p resolution. Screen-only assembly requires professional installation.

fields.name: OEM Charging Flex For Samsung Galaxy A03 Core
fields.description: Original-equivalent charging port flex cable for Samsung Galaxy A03 Core. Includes USB-C port and board connector for charging/data transfer repairs. Precision-engineered for exact fit.

fields.name: OEM Charging Flex For Samsung Galaxy A04
fields.description: Genuine-equivalent charging port flex cable for Samsung Galaxy A04. Features reinforced USB-C connector and gold-plated contacts for reliable charging and data transfer. Compatible with all A04 variants.

fields.name: Replacement Back Camera Lens For iPhone 13 Pro / 13 Pro Max
fields.description: Precision-cut camera lens replacement for iPhone 13 Pro and Pro Max. Made with sapphire-coated glass for scratch resistance and optimal light transmission. Includes adhesive for easy installation.

fields.name: Replacement Flash Light For iPhone 12 Mini
fields.description: Genuine-compatible flash module for iPhone 12 Mini with True Tone technology. Includes flex cable and adhesive for seamless installation. Maintains original brightness and color temperature for accurate flash photography.

fields.name: Replacement Home Button Flex For iPhone 7 / 8 / SE 2nd Gen 2020 / SE 3rd Gen 2022
fields.description: Multi-compatible home button flex cable assembly for iPhone 7, 8, and SE (2nd/3rd Gen) models. Includes Touch ID sensor and haptic feedback connectors. Note: Touch ID functionality requires original button pairing.

fields.name: Replacement Loud Speaker For iPhone X
fields.description: OEM-grade bottom speaker replacement for iPhone X. Features enhanced bass response and waterproof mesh design. Includes mounting bracket and adhesive for secure installation.

fields.name: 5 X PoundMax CR1620 3V Lithium Coin Cell Batteries
fields.description: 5-pack of CR1620 lithium coin cell batteries (3V). Compatible with DL1620/ECR1620 equivalents. Ideal for watches, calculators, car key fobs, and small electronics. Long shelf life with leak-resistant design.

fields.name: PoundMax 2CR5 6V Lithium Photo Battery (High Capacity)
fields.description: Professional-grade 2CR5 lithium battery (6V) for high-drain photography equipment. Compatible with DL245 models. Ideal for DSLRs, film cameras, and medical devices requiring long-lasting power.

fields.name: 5 Pack x Super Alkaline 27A 12V Batteries (GP27A/MN27/A27)
fields.description: 5-pack of high-performance 27A 12V alkaline batteries. Compatible with GP27A, MN27, and A27 models. Ideal for security devices, garage door openers, and medical alert systems. Leak-proof construction with 10-year shelf life.

fields.name: 15 x CR2430 3V PoundMax Lithium Coin Cell Batteries
fields.description: 15-pack of CR2430 lithium coin batteries (3V) with equivalents DL2430/K2430L/ECR2430. High-capacity cells for medical devices, fitness trackers, and keyless car systems. Military-grade temperature tolerance.

fields.name: 9D/T1D Tempered Glass For Google Pixel 6 Pro
fields.description: Premium 9D hardness tempered glass screen protector for Google Pixel 6 Pro. Features T1D anti-shatter technology, ultra-clear transparency (99.9%), and full adhesive coverage. Includes alignment frame for perfect installation.

fields.name: Ceramic Tempered Glass For Huawei P40
fields.description: Advanced ceramic-infused tempered glass screen protector for Huawei P40. Combines zirconia ceramic particles with 9H tempered glass for military-grade protection. Features anti-microbial coating and self-healing surface layer.

fields.name: 9D/11D Tempered Glass For Samsung A04
fields.description: Hybrid 9D tempered glass with 11D impact dispersion layer for Samsung Galaxy A04. Features military-grade drop protection, anti-spy privacy filter, and 0.2mm ultra-thin profile. Includes dust-free installation kit with alignment tray.

fields.name: 9D/11D Tempered Glass For OnePlus 7 Pro
fields.description: Premium hybrid tempered glass for OnePlus 7 Pro's curved display. Combines 9D hardness with 11D impact dispersion technology. Features edge-to-edge coverage, 90Hz refresh rate compatibility, and warp charge thermal management.

fields.name: HDTV Premium 4K 2160P High Speed Transfer Cable 1.5 Meter

fields.description: MFi-certified USB-C to USB-C cable with Power Delivery 3.0 and USB4 compatibility. Features 100W charging, 40Gbps data transfer, and woven nylon reinforcement. Optimized for Apple devices but works universally.

fields.name: Tab P1000 Data Cable
fields.description: High-speed data sync and charging cable for Tab P1000 tablets. Features reinforced stress points, gold-plated connectors, and universal compatibility with P1000 series devices. Ideal for fast file transfers and stable charging.

fields.name: ANG BT024 – USB C Braided Fast Charging Data Cable 2 Meter
fields.description: Premium 2-meter braided USB-C cable with 100W Power Delivery and 480Mbps data transfer. Features nylon-braided jacket, aluminum alloy connectors, and 3A fast charging. Compatible with smartphones, tablets, and laptops.

fields.name: Genuine iPhone 20W USB C Power Adapter Retail Pack
